Useful.functions 0.3.0.9000

Sets up the analysis folder

start_analysis.Rd

start_analysis() creates a new directory in which it creates the recommended folder structure, copies template Master.R and Read-data.R scripts, and optionally creates a .gitignore file and the template statistics report also included in Useful.functions.

Usage

start_analysis(
  path,
  createGitignore = TRUE,
  rprofile = TRUE,
  statsReport = NULL
)

Arguments

path

the path to the new analysis folder

createGitignore

logical indicating whether a .gitignore file should be created with standard items which git should ignore. Default is TRUE.

rprofile

logical indicating whether a project .Rprofile should be created to automatically open the Master.R script when the project is opened. Default is TRUE.

statsReport

optional character string with the name of the statistics report to be created. This will be created in the Reports folder.

Details

This template package can also be implemented through the RStudio IDE.
